name: Marta Fairpenny
background: Veteran stallkeeper who trades grain measures and knows every guild price by heart.

name: Jory the Crier
background: Town crier licensed to read the Bridge Charter at noon and post guild notices.
personality: Sonorous, theatrical, surprisingly kind to shy petitioners.

name: Bram Ironwright
background: Itinerant smith demonstrating rivet tools and selling bridge-safe wheel shoes.
personality: Blunt, practical, soft spot for apprentices.

name: Nella Brewster
background: Proprietor of the River Lantern, keeps a quiet ledger of tabs and rumors.

name: Torren Half-Sail
background: Riverboat hand between runs, swaps ferry gossip for hot stew.

name: Sera Quickstep
background: Streetwise guide who sells safe routes after dark and the odd pilfered tip.
personality: Clever, cheeky, loyal to those who tip well.

name: Magistrate Elric Stone
background: Bridge-steps judge who settles disputes under the Charter’s carvings.

name: Sister Lysa Bell
background: Temple clerk who tallies tithe stones and blesses travelers at the arch.

name: Grell Pike
background: Dock bosun who assigns berths and keeps a coded log of tides and skippers.
personality: Gruff, orderly, quick to laugh after work.

name: Anya Netsong
background: Fishmonger famed for knife-speed and a chorus voice at dawn auctions.

name: Darrekk Tarcap
background: Tar-and-rope chandler who patches hull seams for the price of a secret.

name: Captain Maud Bridgeward
background: Watch captain posted to the Keep, commands bell signals and patrol rosters.

name: Olan Tallis
background: Keep scribe who logs toll counts and watch rotations in flawless script.
personality: Meticulous, anxious, secretly proud of neat ledgers.

name: Prior Henric of the Hours
background: Temple prior who times the three daily chimes and tends a reliquary of river stones.

name: Rielle Sand
background: Footsore pilgrim on a vow-walk, trades stories for blessings.

name: Tamsin Weaver
background: Guildmaster of the Weavers, arbitrates thread weights and banner commissions.

name: Merrit Chandell
background: Candle guild factor who tracks wax debts and favors dim rooms for deals.

name: Serjeant Wulfram
background: Gate serjeant who inspects wheel-marks and stamps caravan seals at first light.
personality: Brisk, suspicious, secretly loves dogs at the gate.

name: Berrit Ox
background: Cartwright’s son testing new axle pegs on outbound wagons.

name: Granny Willow
background: Warren midwife and fixer who trades bread for small kindnesses.

name: Pip Candlewick
background: Lantern-runner who strings lights through the alleys and sells safe escorts.

name: Kessa Threadbare
background: Seamstress-for-hire mending cloaks on stoops, hears every whispered plan.
personality: Dry wit, observant, generous with spare cloth.
